name: @psysecgroup/threaded-sqlite-write
description: Extreme speed SQLite bulk insertions spread across multiple threads then compiled into a single SQLite file.
author: The PsySec Group

scripts.dev: echo 'Type "npm run sb-watch" to get started'
scripts.build: tsup-node --legacy-output --dts --minify --format esm,cjs,iife src/index.ts && tsup-node --legacy-output --minify --format esm,cjs,iife src/insert.ts
scripts.sb-watch: nodemon --watch src/ -e ts,tsx,js --exec "tsup-node src/insert.ts & tsup-node --dts --onSuccess 'node -r source-map-support/register dist/index.js' src/index.ts & wait"
scripts.watch: tsup-node --watch src/insert.ts & tsup-node --watch --dts --onSuccess 'node -r source-map-support/register dist/index.js' src/index.ts & wait
scripts.test: nodemon --watch tests/ --watch src/ -e ts,tsx,js --exec "tsup-node src/insert.ts & tsup-node --entry.tests=tests/index.ts --onSuccess 'uvu -r source-map-support/register dist ^tests.js$' src/index.ts & wait"
